tool_name: AI Based Spelling and Grammar Correction
tool_description: This API can correct grammar and spelling mistakes automatically for the specified text using AI.

api_list.name: text
api_list.description: This API endpoint accepts any text for grammar and spelling correction.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text that needs to be corrected for grammar and spelling errors.
required_parameters.default: Online calculators can make people life easy by helping them in everyday tasks that require calculations. This script comes with 100 built-in calculators that enables you to set-up and launch your complete online calculators website in a matter of minutes.
